// These are generic base actors for monsters, miscellaneous characters,
// and other actors that require them for one reason or another. These
// bases can generally be used for most ReMixer monsters without modifiying
// them too much.

// Monster bases
// The monsters are split into 8 possible types with 5 sizes, or 40 total bases,
// with extra bases as well

// Humanoid enemies
// Zombiemen, Nitrogoloms, Acolytes, etc.

// Tiny size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidTiny
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaSwitch")
			wait
		CalebTesla1: CBGS Y 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla2: CBGS X 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla3: CBGS W 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla4: CBGS V 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla5: CBGS U 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla6: CBGS A 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla7: CBGS B 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla8: CBGS C 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla9: CBGS D 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla10: CBGS E 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla11: CBGS F 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla12: CBGS G 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla13: CBGS H 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla14: CBGS I 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla15: CBGS J 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla16: CBGS K 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla17: CBGS L 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla18: CBGS M 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla19: CBGS N 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla20: CBGS O 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla21: CBGS P 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla22: CBGS Q 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla23: CBGS R 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla24: CBGS S 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla25: CBGS T 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTeslaFinish:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
			"####" "########################" 2 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",CallACS("CalebTeslaBlink"))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.PhosFire:
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("StrifeBurningHumanTiny")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.MarathonFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("SamsaraMarathonBurningCorpseTiny")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedMan",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeath")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("DisintEffectTiny",0,10)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("WTNukeDeathTiny")
			"####" "#################" 3 A_Fadeout(0.05)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		XDeath.PunchDagger:
		XDeath.ElectricBolt:

		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidSmall
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaSwitch")
			wait
		CalebTesla1: CBGS Y 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RRGibSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|1048576)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(96, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LeonardGibTaunt",1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 5 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.SWFist:
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("SWLoWangBloody", 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(218, "Death")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SWFisted")
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt1", 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt2",1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 5 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/MaleScream",CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}


// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 196
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaSwitch")
			wait
		CalebTesla1: CBGS Y 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish
		CalebTesla2: CBGS X 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))

			Loop

			Stop

			Stop
	}
}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidLarge
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 128
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaSwitch")
			wait
		CalebTesla1: CBGS Y 0 A_Pain Goto CalebTeslaFinish

			Stop
	}

			Stop
	}
}

{

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterDemonicLarge
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1

	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 128
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaBlinkNonHumanoid")
			"####" "########################" 2
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
        Death.MarathonFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid

			Stop

			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 27 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterAlienMedium
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 196
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaBlinkNonHumanoid")
			"####" "########################" 2
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
        Death.MarathonFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:

		Death.PhosFireCoop:

		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)

			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}

			Stop
	}

			Stop

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop

			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)

			Stop
	}

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalSmall
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaBlinkNonHumanoid")
			"####" "########################" 2
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:

        Death.MarathonFire:

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)

			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop

			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}

			Stop
	}

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Hexen2/Gib", CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Hexen2GibSpawnerColor",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_SETMASTER|1048576)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			Wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:

		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget

			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt2",1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 5 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

// Beast enemies //
// Most of the Raven monsters, Exhumed ReMixer enemies, etc.

// Tiny size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastTiny
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Pain.Shock:
		Pain.Tesla:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("CalebTeslaBlinkNonHumanoid")
			"####" "########################" 2
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("BRIGHT",0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",0)
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			Wait
		Death.UnrealDamage:

			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(218, "Death")
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt1", 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeathForWang")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(218, "Burn")
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt1", 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")

			TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetSolid

			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(218, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt2",1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 5 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			Wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop

			Stop

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			Stop

			Stop

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop

			Wait

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0

	DamageFactor "DeusExRifleShot", 0.8

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

// Skeleton enemies //
// Lost souls, Wolf3D Spectres, enemies disappearing when dying, etc.

// Tiny size

{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

// Huge size (reserve these for bosses)

{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15

			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}

Actor SamsaraMonsterFlemoidMedium
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "Flem", 0.0
	DamageFactor "Slime", 0.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 196
	+DONTGIB
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

			Stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop

			"####" "#" 27 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}
}

// Large size

{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8

	+NOTDMATCH

	{

			Stop
	}
}

// Miscellaneous character bases
// The misc. characters are split into 4 types of either interactive (dynamic)
// or non-interactive (static) characters, for a total of 8 bases

// Humanoid misc. characters
// Duke3D strippers, Blood innocents, etc.

{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			Wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			Wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 350 // Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			Wait

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:

			Stop
	}

			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			Stop
	}

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 27 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A -1 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
	}
}

// Dark Side AI bases
// Although these bases would only be used in ReMixer when Jerec kills
// a player while downed, it's more convienent to put the bases here in
// Reincarnation. These are split into 3 bases, one for actors with an
// XDeath state, one without an XDeath state, and those that don't gib
// like the Chex Warrior.
Actor SamsaraMonsterDarkSideAIRegular
{
	DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 255
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0
	GibHealth 100
	+NOTDMATCH
	+NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")

			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|1048576)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop
	}
}

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("FreezethrowerWeakness")

		Death.HexenIce:
		Death.WTMeleeIce:
		Death.WTRangedIce:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeIce:
		Death.Ice:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_GenericFreezeDeath
			"####" "#" 70 A_UnsetSolid
			"####" "#" 1 A_IceGuyDie
			TNT1 A 0
			Stop
		Death.ZorchPistol:
		Death.Zorch:
		Death.ZorchKamikaze:
		Death.PhasingZorch:

			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster

Actor Samsara_BossDeath : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
			Stop
	}
}

Actor Samsara_KillMaster : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_KillMaster
			Stop
	}
}

// Most enemies that need special treatment in order to fully get them working,
// have their own bases in ReincarnationMonsterBases.txt, but there are a few that
// might need to have their states manually placed due to possible conflicts with
// certain games or otherwise creating problems; if the monster bases are updated,
// make sure that the needed states are either updated or correctly copied over

//-----------------------
// Reincarnation Enemies:
//-----------------------

// Chex Quest 3
// The Armored Flemoidus Bipedicus, Flemoidus Cycloptis
// Commonus, and Super Cycloptis will need the Robotic
// damagetypes.

// Hacx
// Android - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium

// Harmony
// Echidna - SamsaraMonsterBeastHuge

// REKKR: Sunken Land
// Former King - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge
// Gardien - SamsaraMonsterSkeletonHuge

// Other
// AnubisWarriorReinc - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// StrifePeasant - SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidStatic
// ZDoom Scripted Marine - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium

//-----------------
// ReMixer Enemies:
//-----------------

// Marathon
// Due to the way most of the monsters' XDeath states
// are structured, they'll need to be manually updated
// for nearly all of them.

// Half Life
// HECU Sarge - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium

// Redneck Rampage
// Daisy and Doyle - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium

// Goldeneye 007
// Enemy Base - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMediumTotalGib
